reviewText: My Little Pony has always been my daughters favorite cartoon when she was little, but she still watches them with her 2 yr. old daughter. We just bought this for them and they were mesmerized by it. This stars Minty in this Christmas story, Minty accidently  breaks the Beacon that leads Santa Claus to Ponyville, but don't worry all is saved in the end. My little pony is popular even with the older kids, this story will not disappoint.
Title: My Little Pony: A Very Minty Christmas

reviewText: This was a great new DVD perfect for the upcoming holiday season. My daughters are both My Little Pony fans, so they got right into this and afterwards when I asked what they liked best, they both said "all of it", good description right? I have to say that in watching this, I loved some of the underlying themes that were in it regarding friendship and sharing. While these two messages are ones that I have seen in other My Little Pony shows. This was a great throwback and because it originally came out when my oldest was only one she did not see it previously. Overall, this is a great movie for any family to get their hands on especially if your family are fans of My Little Pony, but also if you enjoy exposing your kids to well done cartoons that have positive messages. I highly recommend!*I received a copy for review - all opinions are my own*
Title: My Little Pony: A Very Minty Christmas

reviewText: goes with my collection of Little Pony DVD's, everyone in the house loves them. can not wait for the next one to be released.

reviewText: What child doesn't love My Little Ponies. This was a great Christmas Present and combined with a My Little Pony Outfit - it was a big hit!

reviewText: My daughter loves this movie.  She even wanted a second copy in case her copy got lost.  Very cute movie for all My Little Pony fans.
